issue.title: Trying to parse an invalid file gives URDF parser error

content.raw: After build from source and debugging this a bit, I think some more info needs to be put in whatever log msgs are generated from this failure. It helped me a lot by putting in the filename of the file(s) that are generating the error messages. Helped me know where to start looking
